Toledo.WKKO:
WKKO is a commercial FM radio station in Toledo, Ohio broadcasting on 99.9 MHz with a country music format.


== History ==
The 99.9 MHz spot on the FM dial in Toledo, Ohio was originally populated by WTRT, known as one of the nation's first FM-band Top-40 format radio stations. In the late 1960s the station became WKLR, playing soul music, later known as "Kooler 99".
